meta.content: Pequannock Township Public School, Pequannock High School, Pequannock Valley, Pompton Plains

li.a: P.R.I.N.T.S Pequannock Reads in the Summer

img.br:
We're Panther Strong and looking to celebrate that during the week of April 20th.
Monday - Vacation Day!
Tuesday - Sport Day
Wednesday - Art Day
Thursday - Literature Day
Friday - School Pride Day

td.br: The district's administrative team generated a list of resources for students interested in continuing their distance learning through spring break (see attached Word document). Enjoy!

td.a: Power Up Pequannock! Donation Drive for Chilton

img.br: The Boys & Girls Club of Pequannock will be holding a Power Up Pequannock Power Bar collection on April 15 to support the heroes at Chilton. Check out the news item for more information.

From our friends at the Pequannock Township Food Pantry: "The Pequannock Township Food Pantry is accepting calls from community residents who are unable to shop for groceries during the Covid-19 Crisis. They will deliver bags of food and basic household items to the best of their ability. Donations are desperately needed as they attempt to continue to service their regular food pantry clients in addition to helping out community residents in need."

We will celebrate Autism Awareness Spirit Week as a district during the week of March 30th. We will maintain social distance while celebrating ALL learners!
Monday: “Be YOU-nique” - Wear Something with Your Name on It!
Tuesday: “Be an Individual” - Wacky Hair & Crazy Sock Day!
Wednesday: “We All Blend Together” - Wear Tie Dye or Bright Colors!
Thursday: “Light It Up Blue” - Wear Blue Day and Blow Bubbles for Autism!
Friday: “We’re All in This Together, Even Though Apart” - Send a Virtual Hug!

td.a: All NJ Schools Closed to Students Until at Least 4/17
td.br: Per Governor Murphy's Executive Order 104, all schools in NJ are closed to students while "this Order remains in effect." As such, we will continue with distance learning indefinitely (no specific end date) and keep up our hope that we will be able to return as soon as possible. Stay strong Panthers!

img.br: Please see the information from Atlantic Health System about donations needed for protective equipment. There is also information about making homemade masks and tips for slowing the spread of COVID-19: https://bit.ly/2UxxmZd We have also attached a PDF with information on how to sew masks. We're in this together!
